content.detailedDescription: I was on i10 headed eastbound fixing to get off the woolmarket exit and i saw a beam of light it was golden/orange it looked like it started off at 90 degrees then went up and down like five times in a 72/27degree angle.. looked almost like a heart moniter when someone died but it was backwards if you know what i mean.. it was like flat line...Then a heart rhythm pattern with a steady bpm.
content.summary: Was on i10 looked up there was flash of ligh resembled rate monitor like how it starts at a line and goes up and down...It reminded me of the moniter of when my father diedhe was the pastor at pass road baptist/thenew sign matched wat i seen!!

content.detailedDescription: I was working on a roof of a commercial building doing a spring a/c maintenance. i was taking a break & laying on my back on the roof looking up at the sky. as i was looking up i noticed movement coming from the east. i thought it was a. plane flying  over head. except this craft was moving across the sky way to fast to be anything man made. when i saw how fast it was moving i stood up. as i was observing the craft i was looking at it at a 45-55 degree angle. the craft was moving east to west across the sky. it appeared to be 30,000-40,000 ft in the air. about cruise altitude where a airplane would fly.  normally when you see a plane fly at cruise altitude across the sky the plane appears to barely move across the sky. this craft was moving 5 times faster than a military jet or anything i've ever seen in the sky.  it was a metallic grey disc shaped craft.  i followed the craft moving from the east to the west until i lost it in the sun.  it made no sound at all.  i plane watch at my house all the time & most planes at cruise altitude can still be heard from the ground.  this thing was so quiet it was eery.  i am a christian, so i immediately started to pray for protection from these demonic beings.  i read your website stating you are trying to figure out these ufo's & who is piloting them.  i know what they are & they are not aliens.  that is what they want everyone to think.  so, they can continue abducting people & continue their ancient hybridization program creating the nephilim.  half human, half fallen angels.  they use these crafts to travel in & out of the deminsions, because they lost their heavenly bodies when they sinned against god.  the bible speaks about them in many books.  they have you all fooled, & when they reveal their true identities it will be to late.  they can appear & disappear.  they can defy the laws of physics.  because, they are fallen angels & they have powers that are "alien" to us.  but, they are not aliens from another planet.  mystery solved!  i know i'm some bible thumping nut.  well this nut could probably take your intel from your investigations & connect it to these fallen angels.  i have studied these beings for along time, & they are highly intelligent.  smarter than you or i.  they can read our thoughts, communicate telepathically, move through solid objects, defy gravity, disappear in a blink of an eye, & can appear as an angel of light. a light so intense it burns your eyes.  the bible speaks about that.  but, you all will never come out & admit to the truth.  because, y'all would be ridiculed by satan's media.  it's easier to believe a lie.  the truth has consequences.  one day you will have to make a choice to side with the liar or to accept the truth in christ.  for me it was pretty easy.  good luck chasing after satan's angels.  they will always be one step ahead unless you all accept the truth & even the playing field.  they have a weakness it's jesus christ.  the name above all names & even the fallen angels have abide by his name. that's my sighting & the truth about these demonic beings you all call ufo's & aliens.  it's hilarious to listen to so called experts call them aliens.  expert in what?  spreading more lies for satan.  be careful chasing after satan's angels.
content.summary: Classic metallic disc shaped craft

content.detailedDescription:
My son (17) and i drove to mcdonald's for a latenight movie snack. 

from highway 70 heading west we entered the left turning lane leading to greenfield heights. clear night, sparse traffic. waiting for green left turn light. it was here while waiting that we made an unusual observation. coming up from the distant east tree line (about 1/2 mile away) at approx 45 degree slope a light leading a large lumbering black shape appeared and headed in our general direction (slightly north westerly). it moved gentle, blimpish, quietly  slowly leveling out as it headed west, at one point it was almost directly above us (slightly north) and we were mesmerized by the length, which was primarily evidenced by the long dark gap between a front large almost led type light on a slightly cone shaped tip to the back with a couple of pattern pulsating red lights (no green, blue or other lights) i rolled down my window and we stared as it continued west toward the north/west forest tree line, in an oddly (low low altitude for such a size) until out of sight. most unusual was its floating type of movement, it's size and very dark exterior, and a very conspicuous lack of sound.

we have lived next to mcas cherry point nearly 20 years. my spouse (now retired) was involved in land air defense on the air station. we can identify numerous aircraft by sight, shadow, sound and movement patterns. we frequently hear flights in and out of cherry point air station including vertical lift helos and of course the harrier jets that can "hover." 

this object was not identifiable to anything previously experienced. it was much larger than known typical military craft, including the c-130. it moved almost like a blimp but was not the large football/blimp shape, more like a long very dark (almost matching the night sky) cigar. the lights initially lead us to believe it was a known craft coming past at an odd angle, but as it leveled out and continued west, it was apparent this was not a known craft, at least not known to me. the lack of sound was particularly fascinating.

i know that sound travels slower than light. whenever we happen to view a helo or other craft at a similar range it takes a moment for the sound to catch up to the viewed object but ultimately it does and we always hear the typical aircraft roars and rumbles. 

as this strange object passed overhead, we listened specifically for any sound patterns. there were none. the object just passed by at quick and steady pace until it was no longer visible. 

we (son and i) both agreed we could not identify this craft so we considered it a ufo.

i was reluctant to share this on mufon, however, i would have appreciated it if i found someone describing something similar that they also experienced and so, in the interest of sharing, here it is. if anyone ask, i'll try drawing it out and post the sketch.

aside from missing our left turn and feeling a bit paranoid, we have experienced no negative side effects.
content.summary: This object was not identifiable to anything  previously experienced. it was larger than known typical military craft, including the c-130.  we observed a long very dark (almost mat

content.detailedDescription: I took my dogs outside around 9:30 or so at night and was coming back in the house and just looked in the sky the direction i was walking and seen a red orb coming towards me at a high rate of speed. as i watched it fly by it made no sound at all,it was a bright red color and flow straight flight path and as i watched it i seen a jet heading towards its path and as it got closer to it the orb disappeared.So i turned around to go in the house and seen another one just like it flying the same path so i open my front door and told my wife to hurry to see this so we both went out and i showed her the red orb and as it flow by with no sound it disappeared about same spot then wife says look another one so turn around and it did the same thing ,same path and disappeared about same area.Then i stood a watched around for a few more minutes and seen nothing else but my neighbor came down the sidewalk and asked me if i seen it.I said yes and he told me he tried to record on his phone but the orb looked like a bright white blob on his phone. so went in the house and thought id report it here.
content.summary: Was outside with my dogs and watched 3 red objects fly  overhead and disappear,got wife and neighbor seen it also

content.detailedDescription: My niece and i went down to the riverbank of the tennessee river not far from my home. we went to take some pictures. after we got home we noticed this odd looking object in one of the photos and could not figure out what it was. it was not observed while we were taking the pictures. only afterward. i am just curious as to what the object is and wanted an expert opinion no matter what it turns out to be.
content.summary: Only saw the object in the picture afterward. did not notice in real time.

content.detailedDescription: I woke up disturbed and uncomfortable, mo idea why. went out on patio. due to the two story townhomes around me i had a 100 ft wide view south unencumbered. i was facing south lighting a cigarette and saw the front point light and beginning of something dark metallic hover/flying on horizon. it was moving extremely slow and very low, and it was entering view from west edge of certain buildings that told me it was over the 59 freeway area. it took at least 30 seconds for the entire object to go past. the ufo was so big i did not have a full view of it, i watched the front to back go by, but the front was out of view by the time the back with 2 lights at corners passed. there was no sound. it was a like a football field in the air. i was shaking as i watched, and put my back against the building to try to hide. but i could not stop watching. for some reason i thought it was scanning everything. when it was gone from view, i went inside in a panic. lost at what to do. within 30 seconds i went back out and looked south again. it was extremely quite outside, and a tingly feeling in the winter air. then further in the distance another one came in to view followed by another one even further away. same triangles with 3 lights at corners. i could see both of them in full view, so if they were as big as the first one then they were several miles away. they took about 60 seconds to clear from view, also moving west to east. it was christmas morning 3:20am on clock when i went back inside. there were no clouds, or other aircraft during this time. it was so bizarre, it has taken me 10 years to think to look and see if anyone else saw it. i had no idea where to report something like this, until i recently heard of mufon. thanks for keeping these records. i needed to share this.
content.summary: 1600ft away observed extremely slow football field size triangular ufo hwy 59n @ kirby, scanning? 3 points of light on each corner, boomerang like at back of triangle. 2 minutes after 1st ufo two more passed further away same direction.

content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine posted this photo on his facebook. it's a simple photo of the airport that he took off from on the morning of october 4, 2014. i looked at the photo and saw a strange object in the upper left corner. it looks like it's in the distance and hovering. my friend suspected it might be a part of the wing, but cannot say for sure. i wanted you guys to analyze the photo to see if it could be a helicopter in the distance, a part of his wing, or something else.
content.summary: Photo of philip billard municipal airport.

content.detailedDescription:
at 8:45 pm halloween night i walked outside the front of the house to look up and down the street to see if there were anymore " trick or treaters " coming before turning out the porch light welcoming them as 9:00 pm was their curfew, i was facing n.W. at that time. just to the right and a little above the house across the street from me was an airliner on approach to indianapolis international, it was a starlit night with not a cloud to be seen, i could clearly see the outline of the aircraft, and could plainly hear the turbines whining as it was slowing down.

 because i was facing n.W. a bright orange light caught my attention from the w.. i immediately focused on it and could tell that it was getting closer very quickly because it was getting larger even though it was still quite far in the distance. as it started to become even larger it was also apparent that it was in fact slowing down. all of this time it was coming across from the corner of an old abandoned grain mill on the other side of the railroad tracks that i have lived by all of my life, and across the flight path of the airliner on approach. i wanted to go inside and get my binoculars, but was afraid i would lose sight of it.

 it slowed to a hover above the white " newly painted  that summer " water tower 100 yards to the w.S.W. of me, there was no sound, and the top of the water tower was bathed in an orange light as the airliner now was passing behind it. i was very excited because i knew what i was experiencing for the second time in my life was a real and true event and i was soaking it all in like a sponge.

 after a minute or so it began to move very slowly to the s.S.E. for another 30 seconds or so and during this time i did step just inside the door and retrieved my binoculars. as i was preparing to bring my optics to bear it very abruptly at a 45* angle " skipped " up and out of sight to the south in the blink of an eye, but i wasn't blinking ! 

 i have no idea as to size or altitude of the object i was watching all i know is that the water tower was bathed with an orange hue that was not a beam of light or spot light of some kind. it was a reflection caused from the craft itself.

 i called the news stations and the airport, but no one verified what i had just witnessed. i thought maybe the pilot of the airliner may have seen it since it most definitely crossed his flight path. so i began to ask myself questions like : (1) did light from the craft only emanate from the bottom and as such evading the pilots vision ? (2) did the pilot in fact see what i saw, but didn't make a report ? (3) did the pilot make a report, but the faa would not confirm my sighting with his ? 

 if you investigate this sighting and uncover some information that corroborates my report i hope you will be so kind as to let me know, and if you would be interested in learning about my first sighting in 79 please feel free to contact me. the main difference in that one being even though i was the only one to actually see the object three other people saw the light from it that filled the interior of my car " because they were sitting in it " and heard the noise " three distinct and different sounds " it made as it passed overhead at a very high rate of speed. i watched as it went from horizon to horizon following the curvature of the earth.

sincerely

name removed/cak
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I watched as it approached from the west, slow to hover, change direction to s.S.E., then disappear @ 45* to the s. !!!

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my patio and noticed the orange orb in the north. i then saw another orange orb right next to it, and then more and more appeared.  i alerted my husband and we moved outside into the street to have an unobstructed view of the sky north of town.  we watched for 8 minutes, and saw multiple formations of orange orbs moving from west to east.  several turned white and dropped down as if they were landing, but that is just conjecture, as they were out of sight.
   the objects just blinked out of sight after traveling east.   we were quite intrigued.  this was an unusual event.
content.summary: Saw between 20 and 30 orange orbs flying in formation north of lisbon ohio.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving from seattle to ashland oregon along i-5 with my brother's family about 10 years ago we were in oregon going through one of the first mountain passes somewhere south of cottage grove, but not quite to roseburg.  after hours of keeping my eyes on the road, i suddenly looked up and to my left, for no apparent reason, to see a tiny imperceptibly small black dot coming right for my nose.  i said "what is that?" and pointed my left index finger into the top left corner of the windshield against the glass.  at that precise instant the windshield shattered slightly precisely where i was touching the glass.  my brother and his wife said that was weird, and we continued on with our drive. meteor?  22 caliber bullet? what made me jerk my head and look precisely at a spot in the sky for a tiny object?

the finger tip that was touched was not injured, but oddly it was the point of my index finger where i had a self induced scar on my finger tip. let me explain,  decades earlier, when i was 15, i developed an odd wart like growth around what felt like a thorn in my finger that appeared on a field trip in new mexico. i thought it was a cactus needle, but no recollection how i acquired it.  anyway it was irritating and i had if for well over a year until i dug into my finger with the point of a knife.  i never could find out what was irritating me just under my skin, and eventually my finger tip scarred over.  i have a hard thick scar on my finger tip to this day like a wart with no protrusion.

just a weird occurrence?
content.summary: Small dot asserts mind control and collides with my finger

content.detailedDescription:
I am not the actual witness. my brother and his girlfriend are. i'm submitting this report on their behalf. my brother and i live in miami, fl. i was at home, and my brother called me on 05/16/2015 at 10:31pm to tell me that he and his girlfriend were witnessing a ufo and that i should go outside and try to see it too. i could not see it from my location, which was farther east, and trees were obscuring my view. my brother was farther west, and he was standing on a second floor balcony with no trees blocking his sight. the ufo was lower to the ground, apparently. 

my brother told me that he and his girlfriend had left a mall in south miami and were headed south to their home, when my brother saw the glowing, white orb in the sky. it was still there when they got home. he said it stayed stationary the entire time they were on their way home. they got home and went out on their second floor balcony in south-west miami-dade. that's when he called me to tell me to get outside. he said it looks like a huge star. a huge glowing star with a haze around it. and that i couldn't be a star because it was too close and too big. i told him to get pictures and video. the pictures showed a stationary, large, glowing orb/sphere, surrounded by a haze. it finally disappeared at 10:41pm. he said it started to fade out slowly, as if it were moving away from the location.
content.summary: Pulsating, white, glowing, orb with a haze around it. stationary .

content.detailedDescription: Around april 25 at approximately 9 pm me and my wife witnessed a orb shape craft ascending and descending making making peculiar flight patterns in the air. it seems amazing viewing the object because its flight pattern was not like any airplane i have seen. i eventually drived off to the store after filming.
content.summary: Orb craft

content.detailedDescription: I woke up in bed paralyzed, unable to move everything except my eyeballs. it was dark in my bedroom except for the streetlights shinning through my two windows that had horizontal blinds and sheer red curtains on them. i looked around and focused my attention on the large open closet. i was more scared than i have ever been in my life, so scared it's hard to describe the sheer terror i was feeling. i never saw what i was scared of but i remember what it was that made me so scared. they,as in two or three, short entities, dark, maybe not solid, but what i remember the most is there red glowing eyes and they were uniformly skinny and approx. 3 1/2' tall. i struggled to move but couldn't. i blacked out. the next thing i know i was still in bed but able to move. i looked at my digital alarm clock and it was blank or off. i got out of bed and tried to turn on lights. none worked as if the power was off. i went into the mud room and opened the breaker box to see if a circuit was blown. they all were at the on position. at that point i wondered if the power was off on all the street. so i went down the stairs leading outside to the back alley. i than walked to the back door to the bar next door to my upstairs apartment. i looked inside and saw the cleaning guy cleaning in the bar. the lights were on at the bar so the power outage was only in my apartment. at that point i went back up to my apartment. i was still scared but nowhere near how i was when i couldn't move. i remember thinking to myself this is a dream but than i pinched myself and felt the pain. after that, i laid back in bed and blacked out again. when i woke the l.E.D.Lights were on on my alarm clock and it read 3:33. i got up and found my cell phone to checked the time. it also read 3:33. at that point i was so freaked out i new i couldn't sleep even though i had to work at 7am that morning. so i decided to call my girlfriend and wake her up. i told her what i had just went through and that i was so scared i couldn't sleep. we talked until daybreak about what i experienced.
content.summary: Home invasion abduction

content.detailedDescription: Had dog out for a walk , observed something cigar kind of shaped maybe 15 feet long 5 feet round dull "dirty" white / grey with dull dirty orange color on at least the side facing me it had structure and detail appeared to be dirty ,like smudged road dirt on a car, it traveled at a constant and straight track i estimate the speed was about 15 mph about 20 feet above my single level home as it traveled over the neighbors home it went behind the tree and out of view.No sound no lights very strange.
content.summary: Had dog out for a walk , observed something cigar kind of shaped maybe 15 feet long 5 feet round

content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 1115-1120 and my friends and i were sitting outside by the pool discussing fireflies when suddenly we observed a strange flash in the sky. the flash was to large to explain and had no chracteristics of modern aviation. we noticed upon the second flash (about 10 seconds later) that there were 3 lights in a triangular shape. the object seemed to be moving at break neck speeds between the flashes which moved from low to high and east to west. in all we witnessed 5 flashes and constant light with quick movement. no doubt it was a ufo, this coming from an retired member of the aviation community.
content.summary: 3 lights, triangular shaped craft in sky...Bright lights!

content.detailedDescription: As a sailor in the know as to the ships location i saw a coherent green light flash across the sky, i went below decks and saw a news broadcast from earlier in the night trying to pass off the lights as ordnance disposal from san clement is. having just left my watch station i knew this to be be false.
content.summary: Not ufo report a gov cover up

content.detailedDescription:
One evening days after hurricane katrina hit miami & left my area without electric service for a week or so, i saw a soundless saucer shaped ufo while i was in my 5th floor balcony playing acoustic guitar. i felt as i was being watched & of course as soon as i realized that at that moment i looked up & saw a dark oval/saucer shaped craft & it immediately shot 2 red lights & 1 white/blueish light at me in patterns "strobe like" then just simply went invisible after 1 minute, it disappeared before my eyes. the same ufo was reported to radio caracol by others in the west miami area / / / /   needless to say i was perplexed then for i had never seen anything like that before. through research ive found out that those light colors are the guitar music notes i was jamming on at that moment./// the following year i began having odd visions of a blue light approaching our planet while crowds engulfed in chaos & also visions of scientific technological multidimensional creations along with an equation. all in a semi asleep/awake state.   
( they triggered something within me,,, now i know it & am now fearless about it)!


i should note that i went through a very weird drinking domestic violent facet of my life years later around 2009-2010.    
( i think those are collateral facets our primitive brain goes through due to all the never ending theological/philosophical questioning one undertakes after such encounter).  either way ive been working hard to un-scar my mind from all the painful events that have taken place in the last decade of my life. 


i've also seen twice a triangle shaped craft on 2013.
( will fill out separate report from this one).
content.summary: Saw a dark oval/saucer shaped craft & it immediately shot 2 red lights & 1 white/blueish light at me in patterns "strobe like" then just simply went invisible after 1 minute, it disappeared before my eyes.

content.detailedDescription:
I was a long haul driver for a company in anchorage alaska. my job required early days and late nights.

i am also a veteran and trained observer, but to this day i am not sure what i saw.

i was on the road heading out and just pasted portage glacier when over my left should was a bright light. i kept driving but also watching it at the same time. it was just a giant fireball, red and yellow flames, but no smoke, no trailing at all. it didnt seem to be moving all that fast but was in an obvious descent.  as i was entering the mountains is where i saw it take a sharp turn westward and crashed into a mountain. 

the crashed occurred appx 30 minutes west of summit lake lodge. from where i was, it took me 40 mins to get close enough on the highway to actually see the mountain kinda close up, and half the mountain was gone. im not talking a small hill, this was a mountain at least 3 or 4 thousand feet high, and the entire east side of the mountain was basically gone.

there was debris of all kinds, trees, rocks,  boulders, scatter everywhere.

by the time i got there, the us army was on site, helicopters were everywhere, armed soldiers everywhere.There was also non military present. 

traffic was at a standstill till the bull dozers were brought in, clearing the highway seemed to be a priority for the army. 

at around 10 am the roads were cleared and at this point alot of traffic was backed up. they made a point of telling people to keep moving and do not get out the their vehicles, or be subject to arrest.

at around noon i arrived in seward alaska, where i was supposed to deliver the linen i was carrying to the princess cruise lines. i missed the ship, it left 2 hours before.

what really strikes me about this incident is that it never made the news, not local, not newspapers, not anything that i saw,
content.summary: Trajectory was nw to se, sharp turn w and crashed into a mountain. half the mountain was gone

content.detailedDescription: I woke up in bed, walked down stairs and saw two men in black suits approx. 6' tall close cut blackhair talking to my mother. as they saw me they turned to run towards me. i ran back up the stairs, into my room and jumped out my closed second story window, through the glass. as i hit the ground i would wake up again in bed and walk down the stairs to see the " men in black again. i would run up into my room and jump out the window again. this process reoccurred at least five times. each time i would be more hesitant to walk down the stairs again. this happened over and over until i finally walked downstairs and they weren't there.
content.summary: Men in black

content.detailedDescription: My mother & i were out for a walk one evening "she is deceased now".  when i noticed four lights & thought there might be a "grand opening of a store", but then noticed they were just not moving.  we observed the lights to be at an angle exactly spaced apart, so we just stopped & stared. all of a sudden the first light took off coming our direction; then the 2nd light took off still spaced exactly apart.   then the 3rd light & 4 lights did the same thing coming out direction.  i knew they weren't airplanes as they didn't have the normal flashing lights that airplanes have.  when they passed by us all you could hear was a "hum", they were traveling in the south like towards tucson.  now i remember that there had been reports of "lights over phoenix" on the news so i attributed this event to be connected to that.  it was the strangest thing i have ever seen.  i didn't know of your organization till i happened to watch an episode just now on tv.  i have always wanted to tell someone about what we saw but didn't know who.  anyway i'm 77 getting close to 78 and wanted to tell someone.  thank you for listening.  sincerely, linda s. beaty.  you can check the date i gave you if you look for articles about "the lights over phoenix", i'm pretty sure is was in 1997 or 1998.
content.summary: Observed lights just standing still & thought there was a grand opening about a mile away.

content.detailedDescription: It was nice outside so i went outside on my front porch , that faces due east , to smoke a cigarette . as i sat on a chair smoking i saw two objects in the southeast sky in the direction of serpent mound that looked like stars . i gave it not much thought except they were low on the horizon . i looked around in the same area of sky and didn't see any other stars. these objects state in the exact spot. one then pulsated bright orange red . i thought something blew up . just after that the two constant a still white lights started dancing in the sky , up , down , vertical and every direction you can state. now pulsating white and moving at great speeds and slow speeds. they moved away from and to each other . this now going about ten minutes. i wanted to grab my phone to record this but i didn't want to miss whatever was going on . in just a blink of an eye there now were 4 white pulsating white objects . i yelled for my wife . she came out just in just time t see them as well. when out of the southwest horizon came 2 more moving faster than anything i had ever seen . we watched them doing the same as i described . now there in the same spot when i had first saw the original 2 . this now going on for about a half hour , starting abt. 10 pm est. it seemed like the 4 didn't like the last 2 as some sort of back and forth frenzy was going on in the sky. the first took off very quick to the northeast upward , and the last 2 moved quickly along the horizon to the southwest and disappeared just in time of the sound of fighter jets entered the area and they were moving quickly. i know this about the jets because the fighter jets often fly in this general area and at times can be seen . the jets this night was very unusual because first they were very loud , either being low to the ground or moving faster then normal , and i have never heard them at night . the jets were very loud and seemed to be many in the sky. the flew in the area for more than an hour and constant for the next couple of days .
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 2 at first looked like stars . 1'pulsated orange bright light . 2 more joined . then out of the southwest 2 more joined

content.detailedDescription:
I was taken by a being that looked human to a small (pelican) island just to the north west of galveston island. when we got out of the man's car he told me to look up. then a glowing white ufo appeared out of thin air. then it descended and landed. when i first seen the ufo appear i was so shocked and confused that i called it a ghost ship. shortly after the ufo landed a group of beings that appeared human (but i knew that they were not human) came out of the ufo in a single file. they paid no attention to me but the man who drove me to the location of the landing site who was wearing a very expensive black business suit seemed to be in charge. the beings that departed the ship obeyed him. i later blacked out and woke up in the morning in my bed.

as time passed what looked to be people would materialize in my apartment and do things to me that have caused my health to deteriorate. ever since that first encounter paranormal things started happening to me. i would also wake up in the morning with strange lesions on my body. 

a while back i bought a motion activated infrared camera from amazon. i set it up just before i go to sleep. i have to take sedatives to help me sleep because it is very hard for me to fall asleep. i am attaching 5 video files of paranormal anomalies that were captured by the camera. some of the anomalies appear and disappear very fast so the speed of the videos should be slowed in order to analyze them properly. one last thing; i know the beings behind all of this are every smart and that they let me obtain videos of anomalies that they wanted me to have.
content.summary: Taken to a small island and seen ufo and aliens

content.detailedDescription: A brother, sister and their friend went to cedar creek, ks to go fishing. when they arrived and walked up to bridge, the brother and sister saw a white stationary light under the water. this scared the boy and he began running to the car. the girl turned to tell him to come back as their friend arrived at the bridge. when both looked at the water their were now three orange lights, 6 feet equidistance, in a triangular shaped formation under the water. this freaked them out as well. they ran away and left the scene.
content.summary: Three orange lights in a triangular shape, six feet apart, under water.

content.detailedDescription: I was at church on a wends day night. i had an unexplainable urge to leave. i told my mother that i had a headache and i wanted to go sit in the car. i went outside and sat in passenger seat if my mothers car. i was looking up at the stars. when i realized something wasn't right. the stars i was looking at we're moving. they were moving randomly as if battling. than as if docking, at least five of them all converged on a single star that did not move. after that i blacked out and the next thing i saw was people walking out of the church. church was over and i lost from a hour to an hour and a half of time.
content.summary: Several stars moving than converge into one

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 12:30 in the morning, the witnesses prepared to leave their home to "rescue" an aunt who was in the middle of a domestic dispute. as they went to their car, they saw seven white orbs about the size of oranges, interacting with one another near a streetlight 1/2 half block from their home. when their car passed underneath both felt an electric tingling in their skin and their hair stood on end.

the orbs were identical to two orbs that witness a and her mother, jennifer reagan, had observed in the exact location three days earlier.
content.summary: Seven orbs circumventing a street light.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the roof of my parents apartment having a cigarette after dinner. i was watching the jets (looking northwest at the horizon) take off from the airport in the distance.The airport is about 12-14 miles away (as the crow flies) from where i was standing. the triangular shaped object caught my eye above and to the left of the direction i was looking. i thought it was an aircraft at first, but it had no flashing lights like the jets i was watching did. it came from the north (my right) moving slow, and with no sound moved to the south.I estimate it was about 500 feet above me on an angle. it was thick, big, dark, and had 5 to 7 pulsating amber color lights (in a row) on the back of the triangle. it also had smaller, dimmer lights of some kind on the bottom/sides that were not flashing, but i was focused more on the back end of it. i noticed these lights as it passed me, just to the west/southwest. at this point, i estimate that it traveled 20 miles to the south in about 8 to 10 seconds, almost like it was speeding up as it got farther away from me. just as it was fading away in the distance i saw it do a 90 degree turn, and like it was in warp speed it disappeared to the east over the mountains. at this point i was in an awe state of mind and something told me not to say anything about what i saw. like it sent me a message to just forget about it. i went back down the steps off the roof and into my parents apartment with no urge to tell my parents or my sisters that were there. the next day i did end up telling my parents. they laughed at me first, but then proceeded to tell me that mexicans in the area have seen other ufo type objects. your program convinced me to report this sighting and i did see an episode that had a very similar type craft in it. thank you and i hope this helps with your investigations.
content.summary: Big! triangle shape with pulsating amber color lights on the back that looked like the afterburner of jet but there were 5-7 or so on back.

content.detailedDescription: The person who took this photo of the sunset in bartlet, tennessee never noticed the object until she looked at the photo upon arriving home. on the way home she saw the sunset and felt compelled to take a photo. she stopped in her neighborhood on the side of the road and took the picture. upon arriving home she saw the greenish grey object. she was shocked. she  immediately sent it to me in virginia  because she knew i have witnessed such an event in may 2007 in florida. she described it as a large gray eye looking at her. i am a believer in ufo's existence and now i believe she has a new perspective. i reported it for her with her permission because she does not want the attention due of her career.
content.summary: Person who sent picture of object to me was driving near home, saw sunset, felt compelled to take photo, saw object in photo, sent it to me.

content.detailedDescription: I wish not to disclose any information about my three encounters at this time like this, the first encounter included mc guire air force base and momounth air force base in nj. i hope you forgive my spelling, the second encounter you won't believe and i may not talk about, the third happened where i live now in pa. and also includes a bigfoot!!!
content.summary: On final event was round and believed to meet two

content.detailedDescription: On around friday september 14,2007 i was at my friends house in ocean springs, mississippi with 3 other friends and we were sitting outside on his back porch and around 2am we saw 3 orb like balls of glowing white lights all in a straight line and it moved in weird patterns for about 7mins and then it took off quite quickly heading west towards biloxi, mississippi which is where keesler air force base is located but about 2mins after it took off 2 military jets flew by heading the way the orbs went. i wanted to report what we saw but i didn't think we would be taken serious or just written off as crazy.
content.summary: Orb like 3 balls of light pretty bright

content.detailedDescription:
On july 21 2014 i was visiting family in california it was that night and me and my nephew were outside talking and all of a sudden his eyes looked very strange he looked at me and pointed to the sky and i seen what i thought was a shooting star but it stopped and went back the way it came and all of a sudden was just above us it was like something took over my nephew and was talking to me through him he said he has known me for many years it truly scared me very much i mean who do u tell this to without being thrown in the nut house the next night i headed home around 12 an i reached az state line i was going to drive through the night my next memory i was on the side of i 40 10 am the next morning my battery to my truck and phone where completely dead and my head felt so foggy i looked in my mirror and 50 ft behind  me was a black suv once i gathered my mind i got out and opened the hood all of a sudden the suv whipped around me and nosed up to my truck like they knew my problem a m.I.B g

7/21noticed what looked like shooting stars while sitting with me nephew and all of a sudden something took him over and began speaking to me about how it would be to know secrets about aliens and this was not my nephew i left town and was abducted
content.summary: 7/21noticed what looked like shooting stars while sitting with me nephew and all of a sudden something took him over and began speaking to me about how it would be to know secrets about aliens and this was not my nephew i left town and was abducted
